description: Defines the Response class within the WebSockets::JsonRpc namespace, representing a JSON-RPC response message with methods to access response ID, result, errors, and validity.

classes.name: Response
classes.description: Represents a JSON-RPC response message, providing accessors for ID, result, error, and validity checks.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the response.

methods.name: isResult
methods.description: Checks if the response contains a result.

methods.name: getResult
methods.description: Retrieves the result object from the response.

methods.name: isError
methods.description: Checks if the response contains an error.

methods.name: getError
methods.description: Retrieves the error object from the response.

methods.name: isValid
methods.description: Validates if the response is well-formed.
